basics.name: Chunghwan Lee
basics.label: Researcher in 3D Computer Vision
basics.summary: I work on 3D scene reconstruction, visual localization, and privacy-preserving 3D mapping using neural representations.

work.name: NAVER LABS
work.summary: Research internship on generalizable 3D Gaussian splatting from unposed sparse-view images.
highlights: Developing a generalizable feed-forward 3D Gaussian splatting model for 3D scene reconstruction from unposed sparse-view (paired-view) images using DUSt3R and MASt3R.

work.name: Hanyang SAIL Lab (HY-Vision Lab), Hanyang University
work.summary: Graduate research on privacy-preserving visual localization and 3D line cloud representations.
highlights: Developed a privacy-preserving 3D line cloud generation method that draws lines by pairing two points, named Paired-Point Lifting (PPL).
Demonstrated that PPL conceals scene details while maintaining camera pose re-localization accuracy.

work.name: NIAI Lab, Hanyang University
work.summary: Deepfake video detection using temporal feature analysis.
highlights: Developed a classification model to discern deepfake videos by training the model to extract abrupt temporal features with a PCA-based loss.

work.name: ICSP Lab, Hanyang University
highlights: Devised a one-for-all model that performs both weather classification and reconstruction under adverse weather conditions such as rain, snow, and haze.

projects.name: Generalizable 3D Gaussian Splatting with Unposed Images
projects.description: Developing a feed-forward 3D Gaussian splatting model for 3D reconstruction from unposed sparse-view images.
highlights: Used DUSt3R and MASt3R to estimate geometry and guide 3D Gaussian splatting.
Focused on generalization across scenes and viewpoints.

projects.name: Enhancing Privacy-Preserving Visual Localization
projects.description: Privacy-preserving visual localization using paired-point lifting and 3D line clouds.
highlights: Proposed Paired-Point Lifting (PPL) to generate privacy-preserving line cloud maps.
Demonstrated robustness against scene recovery attacks while maintaining pose accuracy.

projects.name: Deep Learning-based Sketched Face Recognition
projects.description: Recognizing faces from human sketches using deep learning.
highlights: Fine-tuned ArcFace for sketched face recognition.
Augmented sketch data using CycleGAN for improved robustness.

projects.name: Deepfake Video Detection
projects.description: Detecting deepfake videos via temporal feature analysis.
highlights: Trained models to capture abrupt temporal features indicative of manipulation.
Used PCA-based loss to emphasize abnormal variations.

projects.name: Image-based Weather Classification and Restoration
projects.description: All-in-one model for classification and restoration under adverse weather conditions.
highlights: Designed a model that handles classification and reconstruction for rain, snow, and haze.
